signInPanel.details: Please sign in with your Mastodon account before using MastodonRater.
controlPanel.details: Feel free to choose any services, please.
controlPanel.tootRater: Toot the proportion of your statuses to whole
controlPanel.tpd: Toot an average of number of your statuses
relevanceAnalyzer.rangeConfirmer.details: Please select date range, and it will be used to get information.
(*Longer the range, longer the time you'll spend!)
relevanceAnalyzer.rangeConfirmer.skipCon: Will you skip over confirming a ranking before tooting?
relevanceAnalyzer.rankingConfirmer.title: Confirm ranking | Relevance Analyzer
relevanceAnalyzer.rankingConfirmer.detai: Please accept to toot this ranking.
contactPanel.details: If you have any questions or anything, feel free to contact me.
Don't you have any accounts in Mastodon? Let's contact from e-mail with you! :)
